ygData.subject: RE: Need Mistmoore Info was Trade of the Century..
ygData.msgSnippet: Do players who are Dark Elf take bad faction hits if they hunt/fight in this zone? Also, what is the faction of unkempt druids?  Are the druid camps by the
ygData.messageBody:
Do players who are Dark Elf take bad faction hits if they hunt/fight in this
zone?

Also, what is the faction of unkempt druids? Are the druid camps by the
gate points the same as these? Like the druids in west common lands & east
and north karanas vesus the druids in Rathe Mountains.

Sylly - the bard.

-----Original Message-----
From: Dan Morris [mailto:a3a63342@...]
Sent: Wednesday, October 13, 1999 9:17 AM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Trade of the Century..

From: "Dan Morris" <a3a63342@...>

Harm wrote:
>Castle Mistmoore can flush a full 40+ group very quickly.


Dunno your level or type of group you play with, but you are
in error (not a
direct personal attack, maybe just misinformed). A friend of
mine (Druid 50)
and myself (Warrior 45) are able to clear out the Princess,
Butler, Maid,
Vampire, and gypsy (late, cant think of the exact names)
spots in about 15
mins.
